data.meta_description: Renault Nissan Automotive India Pvt Ltd | 32,062 followers on LinkedIn. Renault Nissan Automotive India Pvt Ltd (RNAIPL), the first dedicated Alliance plant globally, started operations in 2010. The plant is spread over 600 acres in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India. RNAIPL caters to both domestic and export market requirements for Renault and Nissan.

This World Environment Day, Renault Nissan Automotive India Pvt Ltd (RNAIPL) is proud to announce its commitment to revitalise five additional water bodies in and around Oragadam (Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India), where the manufacturing plant is located. In addition to the ten water bodies pledged for revitalisation last year in the Oragadam area, out of which nine have already been rejuvenated and handed back to the local communities, this latest announcement brings the total number of water bodies that will be revitalised by RNAIPL to 15. At RNAIPL, sustainability is at the core of everything we do. üåç ‚òÄ üå≥ On Earth Day, we reflect on our ongoing commitment to sustainability, centered on the three-pillared approach to carbon neutral operations by 2045. From increasing usage of green energy to improving efficiencies in energy usage and adopting energy saving technology, we're driving impactful change at our Oragadam plant. Our energy portfolio includes a mix of conventional and renewable sources, with plans to transition to 100% consistent renewable energy usage by 2045. Between July and December 2023 on an average, our plant utilized more than 85% green energy every month, also achieving 100% green energy utilization in September 2023. Our commitment also extends to water management strategies including being water positive and clear targets for reduction in energy used for car manufacturing. Join us in our mission for a cleaner, greener planet! Happy Earth Day! #EarthDay #Sustainability #RNAIPL #CarbonNeutral2045 #RenaultNissan #Manufacturing

At RNAIPL we are committed to our goal of reaching Carbon Neutral operations by 2045. An important pillar for achieving this goal is the increased use of green energy. I'm happy to announce that RNAIPL has operated with more than 85% green energy on an average during the six month period between July and December 2023. In addition, during the month of September we used 100% green energy to power our operations. I'm proud of our team who are working hard to reduce the environmental impact of our operations. #sustainability #sustainablemanufacturing #greenenergy #renaultnissan #rnaipl
